entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers beginning this evening then changing to periods of snow after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon.
